rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
[i]King of Grappling[/i] – As long as you have 10 or less life, other creatures you control get +2/+2.
[i]Painful Gamble[/i] – Whenever a legendary creature you control dies, you may cloak the top card of your library. If that card is a noncreature card, you may exile it. If you do, each player loses life equal to that cards mana value.
